Description of incident: Two men were indicted for their role in a skimming plot.  They are accused of fraudulently obtaining $400,000 by placing skimming devices at gas pumps at Wal-Mart stores for up to two months at a time.  The then created counterfeit cards by using hte legitimate card information obtained through skimming.  The skimming ring ran from April 2012 through January 2013.
